snippet.title: Kumitantei: Old-School Slaughter | GAMEPLAY TRAILER
snippet.description:
Is survival in the cards? Kumitantei's Demo and Kickstarter campaign are launching September 2024!

Support on Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/mangofactory/kumitantei-old-school-slaughter

Kumitantei: Old-School Slaughter is a new murder-mystery adventure game inspired by #Danganronpa and the works of Rumiko Takahashi (#UruseiYatsura), with gameplay ranging from deck-building and tense card battles to classic visual novel socialising and puzzle-solving!
Coming to Steam and #NintendoSwitch!
Music by @Hundotte!

Subscribe for updates! https://shorturl.at/oxMO3
Wishlist on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2759280/Kumitantei_OldSchool_Slaughter/
Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/mangofactory
Follow on Twitter: https://twitter.com/MangoFactoryEN
Follow on Bluesky: https://bsky.app/profile/mangofactory.win

https://www.mangofactory.win/kumitantei

#kumitantei #gamedev #indiedev
